channel.title: Account error when changing player rights to 3
channel.description:
Heya MoparScape
When I wanted to login with my owner account yesterday, it was working.
But when I wanted to login today, it said error connecting to server..
So I changed the rights of some other acc to 3 and it didnt work too
Anyone knows what the problem is?
I only added slayer points yesterday, could that make an error like this?
Greetz

item.title: Account error when changing player rights to 3
item.dc:creator: @I_fk I fk
item.description:
@I_fk wrote:

Do you only get this error on the owner account?

Read full topic
item.source: Account error when changing player rights to 3

item.title: Account error when changing player rights to 3
item.dc:creator: @mthijs3 mthijs3
item.description:
@mthijs3 wrote:

metal k0:

It doesn’t have anything to do with player rights, error connecting to server means that it cannot connect to the server, thus your server is offline.

It isn’t… other players are playing and I can login with other accounts too?

Read full topic
item.source: Account error when changing player rights to 3

item.title: Account error when changing player rights to 3
